```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(rtables)
```

```{r}
ADSL <- ex_adsl

basic_table() %>%
    split_cols_by("ARM") %>%
    analyze(vars = c("AGE", "BMRKR1"), afun = function(x) {
        in_rows(
            "Mean (sd)" = rcell(c(mean(x), sd(x)), format = "xx.xx (xx.xx)"),
            "Range" = rcell(range(x), format = "xx.xx - xx.xx")
        )
    }) %>%
    build_table(ADSL)
```
